article_text:
Drugmakers didn’t let up on price increases with the start of a new year, demonstrating the industry’s pricing power in the face of mounting criticisms of prescription costs in the U.S.

Pfizer Inc., Amgen Inc., Allergan PLC, Horizon Pharma PLC and others have raised U.S. prices for dozens of branded drugs since late December, with many of the increases between 9% and 10%, according to equity analysts. The increases are on list...

twitter.description: Politicians, health care payers, doctors and patients criticized drug pricing in recent months, but that hasn’t stopped pharmaceutical companies from continuing to jack up price tags.
twitter.title: Drugmakers Raise Prices Despite Criticisms

image.alt: Drugmakers keep raising prices despite mounting criticisms

twitter.creator: @Loftus

article_summary:
The increases are on list...
Drugmakers didn’t let up on price increases with the start of a new year, demonstrating the industry’s pricing power in the face of mounting criticisms of prescription costs in the U.S.Pfizer Inc., Amgen Inc., Allergan PLC, Horizon Pharma PLC and others have raised U.S. prices for dozens of branded drugs since late December, with many of the increases between 9% and 10%, according to equity analysts.
